thread.title: Julia Hartley-Brewer slams Tara Palmer-Tomkinson less than a DAY after her tragic death
thread.title_full: Julia Hartley-Brewer slams Tara Palmer-Tomkinson less than a DAY after her tragic death

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Julia Hartley-Brewer slams Tara Palmer-Tomkinson less than a DAY after her tragic death
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
While she's hardly known for keeping her opinions to herself, Julia Hartley-Brewer has angered social media with her latest remarks. 
Tara Palmer-Tomkinson was tragically found dead in her home yesterday, and fans rushed to pay their condolences to the former IT girl. 
Despite friends and family of the star still being in mourning, Julia took to Twitter less than 24 hours later to share her thoughts on the former I'm A Celebrity star. 
Criticising Tara in an insensitive social media post, the less famous version of Katie Hopkins told fans: "I'm sorry Tara Palmer-Tomkinson has died but can we please stop pretending she was anything more than a posh version of a reality TV star." Tara Palmer-Tomkinson has been found dead aged 45 
Her followers were quick to criticise her comment, with one firing back: "You don't sound sorry that someone has died? More like you'd rather be wilfully contrary to enhance your brand than be respectful?" 
"The woman has passed away, a day ago, you shown her memory no respect. She's loved by many & you're being cruel. Behave," argued a second. Owen Jones walked out an interview last year (Photo: Sky News) 
While a third follower added: "A bit unfair. She was open about her failings showing us that privilege does not necessarily bring success and/or happiness."
